snippet: The “Fred Voodoo” referred to in the title of Amy Wilentz’s new book represents to her all the stereotypes outsiders have come to attach to Haitians.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Farewell, Fred Voodoo: A Letter From Haiti by Amy Wilentz.
lead_paragraph: The “Fred Voodoo” referred to in the title of Amy Wilentz’s new book represents to her all the stereotypes outsiders have come to attach to Haitians.

headline.seo: Amy Wilentz’s ‘Farewell, Fred Voodoo: A Letter From Haiti’
headline.main: The Wounds of a Nation Still Bleed
headline.print_headline: The Wounds Of a Nation Still Bleed
